description: JSON schema for the TrashEntity POJO. A trashed entity is an entity in the trash can.

deletedByPrincipalId.title: Deleted By
deletedByPrincipalId.description: The ID of the user who deleted the entity.

deletedOn.title: Deleted On
deletedOn.description: The date and time when the deletion occurred.

originalParentId.description: The ID of the original parent before deletion.
